description:
It’s been a while since we’ve seen good, old Jeremy Gilbert (Steven R. McQueen) on “The Vampire Diaries,” but we expect he’s been busy hunting down vampires all across the country (not to mention putting out fires in Chicago).我们已经好久没见到看到在《吸血鬼日记》里表现很棒的Jeremy Gilbert（Steven R. McQueen）了，但我们猜想他全国性地追踪吸血鬼应该很忙（指的不是在芝加哥扑灭大火）。

Now that McQueen has officially been written off “Chicago Fire” though, we can’t help but wonder if he’ll use his new free time to pay a visit to the inhabitants of Mystic Falls as the show that launched his career comes to an end.现在McQueen已经被官方写进“芝加哥大火”，我们忍不住想知道他会不会抽空去看一看神秘瀑布镇的居民因为他的吸血鬼的职业生涯迎来了结束。

Unfortunately for all you Jeremy fans, McQueen might want to move forward instead of backward at this point in his career. McQueen can, and certainly should, land a leading role in a new show this year, but we’ve got our fingers crossed he’ll manage to make a short cameo as we approach the series finale of “The Vampire Diaries.” If only to see Elena inevitably wake up one day in the distant (or not so distant) future.对所有Jeremy的所有粉丝不幸的是，McQueen已经向前走了而不是停留在职业生涯的这个地方。今年他可以，肯定能够出演其他剧作的主角，但我们仍然十分希望他能够对《吸血鬼日记》最后一季说说点什么。但愿我们能很快看见Elena能够快点醒来（或者不要醒来了）。

“The Vampire Diaries” returns Friday (Oct. 21) at 8 p.m. ET/PT on The CW.《吸血鬼日记》第八季将在10月21日周五晚上8点在CW回归。

声明：本双语文章的中文翻译系沪江英语原创内容，转载请注明出处。中文翻译仅代表译者个人观点，仅供参考。如有不妥之处，欢迎指正。

title: 《吸血鬼日记》第八季女主弟弟Jeremy将不再出现？
